MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the FK9 postcode area of Stirling. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 9:30am due to damaged equipment within the Johnstone Avenue substation and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by midday. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:05am on Friday, 16 April 2021
